etinker.description: Tinker input: xyz [Angstroem] with a given molecule centered in the box

item.name: cutoff
item.description: In the xyz-N file for the charged molecule N only neighboring molecules up to the cutoff (in nm) are written out. If no cutoff is provided 50nm is assumed

item.name: order
item.description: If order is "keep" the ordering of the molecules is not affected. If "top" is chosen, the charged molecule N will be on top of the xyz-N file.
